summary.span: 一个表示联合源类别的类。

span.span: A class that represents the category of a syndication feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别允许您分配一个或多个关键字，用以搜索信息。A category allows you to assign one or more keywords that can be used to search for information. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何创建 对象，并添加具有 的 。The following code shows how to create a and add a with a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 联合对象模型允许您将自定义属性添加到 实例中。The syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a instance. 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 这些扩展会序列化为 `` 元素的属性。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` element.

A collection of element extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specification. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. ## Examples 下面的 XML 演示如何将具有自定义元素的 序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how a with a custom element is serialized to Atom 1.0. ``` Some text ``` > [!NOTE] > 实例中的自定义元素无法序列化为 RSS 2.0。Custom elements within instances are not serialized to RSS 2.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化为 Atom 1.0 时属性写入`scheme`属性的 <`category`> 元素。When serialized to Atom 1.0, the property is written to the `scheme` attribute of the <`category`> element. 序列化为 RSS 2.0 时属性写入`domain`属性的 <`category`> 元素。When serialized to RSS 2.0, the property is written to the `domain` attribute of the <`category`> element. ## Examples 下面的 XML 演示如何将 属性序列化为 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to Atom 1.0. ``` ``` 下面的 XML 演示如何将 属性序列化为 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to RSS 2.0. ``` FeedCategory ```

span.span: The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
The attribute to parse.

param.name: version
param.span: 要在分析时使用的联合版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use when parsing.
Attempts to parse an attribute extension.

returns.span: 一个指定是否已成功分析属性扩展的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范未定义的自定义属性。Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 这些扩展会序列化为 `` 元素的属性。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` element. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义属性扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 为此，请从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的属性扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

exception.span: 读取过程中遇到无效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素扩展是 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 规范中未指定的有效 XML 元素。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 可以添加任何有效的 XML 元素作为扩展名，只要该元素的命名空间与外层命名空间不同。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 此方法是一个扩展点，您可以利用它来处理自定义元素扩展的反序列化。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 为此，请从 中派生一个类，并重写此方法。To do this, derive a class from and override this method. 将为所有无法识别的属性扩展调用此方法。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.
